songs.title: Gold (Live From Spotify London)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
One, two
One, two, three

[Verse 1]
First comes a blessing of all that you've dreamed
But then comes the curses of diamonds and rings
Only at first did it have its appeal
But now you can't tell the false from the real

[Pre-Chorus]
Who can you trust?
Who can you trust?

[Chorus]
When everything, everything
Everything you touch turns to gold, gold, gold
Everything, everything
Everything you touch turns to gold, gold (Ooh)


[Post-Chorus]
Gold (Oh, ooh)
Gold (Oh oh oh, ooh)
Gold (O-o-oh, ooh)
Gold
O-o-o-o-o-o-o-oh

[Verse 2]
Statues and empires are all at your hands
Water to wine and the finest of sands
When all that you have's turning stale and it's cold
You'll no longer feel when your heart's turned to gold

[Pre-Chorus]
Who can you trust?
Who can you trust?

[Chorus]
When everything, everything
Everything you touch turns to gold, gold, gold
Everything, everything
Everything you touch turns to gold, gold (Ooh)

[Post-Chorus]
Gold (Oh oh oh, ooh)
Gold (Oh oh oh, ooh)
Ah, gold (O-o-oh, ooh)
Gold
O-o-o-o-o-o-o-oh

[Bridge]
I'm dyin' to feel again
Oh, anything at all
But, ooh, I feel nothin'
Nothin'
Nothin'
Nothin'

[Chorus]
When everything, everything
Everything you touch turns to gold, gold, gold
Everything, everything
Everything you touch turns to gold, gold (Ooh)

[Post-Chorus]
Gold (Oh oh oh, ooh)
Gold (Oh oh oh, ooh)
Ah, gold (O-o-oh, ooh)
Gold
O-o-o-o-o-o-o-oh

[Outro]
Thank you, guys, so much
